basics.name: Zhuhan Bao
basics.summary: Currently a sophomore in Software Engineering. Research and project experience in AI, high-performance computing and bioinformatics.

work.summary: Systematic Security Impacts Investigation of MCP Servers in AI Code Editors. Responsibilities include evaluating MCP server support for the SDLC, developing automated deployment workflows, and analyzing security risks.

work.summary: Medical Multimodal Dataset Construction and Large Model Research Based on Online Teaching Videos. Tasks: web crawling, dataset alignment, and LoRA fine-tuning of CLIP models.
